title: UpdateSchema failed
description:
Hi , I'm new, very new!
I have runned the book tutorial and when I run Ant task UpdateSchema it failed, see below . PLease help.
E:\Dev\openxava-4m3\workspace\Invoicing\build.xml
updateSchema:
defineHibernateTool:
updateSchemaJPA:
[hibernatetool] Executing Hibernate Tool with a JPA Configuration
[hibernatetool] 1. task: hbm2ddl (Generates database schema)
[hibernatetool] 12-Apr-2010 14:50:07 org.hibernate.cfg.annotations.Version <clinit>
[hibernatetool] INFO: Hibernate Annotations 3.4.0.GA
[hibernatetool] 12-Apr-2010 14:50:07 org.hibernate.cfg.Environment <clinit>
[hibernatetool] INFO: Hibernate 3.3.1.GA
[hibernatetool] 12-Apr-2010 14:50:07 org.hibernate.cfg.Environment <clinit>
[hibernatetool] INFO: hibernate.properties not found
[hibernatetool] 12-Apr-2010 14:50:07 org.hibernate.cfg.Environment buildBytecodeProvider
[hibernatetool] INFO: Bytecode provider name : javassist
[hibernatetool] 12-Apr-2010 14:50:07 org.hibernate.cfg.Environment <clinit>
[hibernatetool] INFO: using JDK 1.4 java.sql.Timestamp handling
[hibernatetool] 12-Apr-2010 14:50:08 org.hibernate.annotations.common.Version <clinit>
[hibernatetool] INFO: Hibernate Commons Annotations 3.1.0.GA
[hibernatetool] 12-Apr-2010 14:50:08 org.hibernate.ejb.Version <clinit>
[hibernatetool] INFO: Hibernate EntityManager 3.4.0.GA
[hibernatetool] 12-Apr-2010 14:50:08 org.hibernate.ejb.packaging.PersistenceXmlLoader$ErrorLogger fatalError
[hibernatetool] SEVERE: Error parsing XML: XML InputStream(13) The markup in the document following the root element must be well-formed.
[hibernatetool] An exception occurred while running exporter #2:hbm2ddl (Generates database schema)
[hibernatetool] To get the full stack trace run ant with -verbose
[hibernatetool] Problems in creating a configuration for JPA. Have you remembered to add hibernate EntityManager jars to the classpath ?
[hibernatetool] java.lang.reflect.InvocationTargetException
[hibernatetool] javax.persistence.PersistenceException: Unable to configure EntityManagerFactory
[hibernatetool] org.xml.sax.SAXParseException: The markup in the document following the root element must be well-formed.

BUILD FAILED
E:\Dev\openxava-4m3\workspace\Invoicing\build.xml:38: The following error occurred while executing this line:
E:\Dev\openxava-4m3\workspace\OpenXava\build.xml:878: Problems in creating a configuration for JPA. Have you remembered to add hibernate EntityManager jars to the classpath ?

Total time: 625 milliseconds

replies.body:
Please, put your question in the OpenXava Help forum:
https://sourceforge.net/projects/openxava/forums/forum/419690

Thanks

I have the same trouble, how did you solve it?
